column5: Stephen Brunt's video essay on these Olympic games.  http://www.ctvolympics.ca/video/index.html...amp;PbContext=2
Stephen Brunt as usual did a great job of catching the spirit of things.  The voice of reason on the fan prime time and he writes a great sports book as well.  Thanks for posting that video.
Brunt is from the Hammer! Met the guy, about as good a sports reporter as there is.
And he has that place in Newfoundland to go fishing.
That was the best,,,,,,, Well done CANADA !!!!!!!!!!!!  That was an amazing end to the Olympics  ....  a lot of national pride .... awesome to see
